articles.title: Tampa General Hospital to be among first hospitals with the COVID-19 vaccine - FOX 13 Tampa Bay
articles.description: Tampa General Hospital has been chosen as one of the few in Florida to get the vaccine first once approved, according to a report.
articles.content:
TAMPA, Fla. - Tampa General Hospital will be among the first across Florida to store the new COVID-19 vaccine while they wait for final approval to use it.

articles.title: Democratic Republic of the Congo declares the end to its 11th Ebola outbreak - CNN
